arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ لَا تَخْذُلْنِيْ فِيْهِ لِتَعَرُّضِ مَعْصِيَتِكَ
بِمَنِّكَ وَأَيَادِيْكَ يَا مُنْتَهَى رَغْبَةِ الرَّاغِبِينَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] do not disappoint me by allowing me expose myself to acts of disobedience to You,
And do not beat me with the whips of Your punishment,
And (please] take me out on this day from the acts that bring about Your ire,
Out of Your favoring and bounties; O the ultimate goal of the desires of the desirers.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma lā takhdhulnī fīhi lita`arruḍi ma`ṣiyatik
bimannika wa-ayādīka yā muntahā raghbatir rāghibīn
